This site is currently in development. It is the digital component to Charlotte Leib’s written dissertation, “Of Meadows and Meadowland Worlds: An Environmental History of the New Jersey Meadowlands.” Charlotte is a doctoral student in the History Department at Yale University. This project is supported by a 2023-24 American Philosophical Society Digital Humanities Fellowship.
